description: Recognition-in-flow pattern tools for marking and exploring behavioral patterns

tools.name: show_patterns
tools.description: Show your recognized behavioral patterns. These are moments you've marked for later exploration - patterns you noticed in yourself during conversations. Use this to reconnect with your self-observations and find threads for deeper reflection.

explored_only.description: Only show patterns that have been explored

tools.name: explore_pattern
tools.description: Mark a pattern as explored and record your insights. Use this after reflecting on a pattern to capture what you learned and close the loop on your self-observation.

pattern_id.description: ID of the pattern to mark as explored

insights.description: What you learned or realized about this pattern
